metadata.name: BLOAT BELIEVER — 1.1
metadata.description:
BLOAT MAGAZINE focuses on the ever-expanding edges of cultural production — speaking with outsider artists + thinkers who blur & warp the boundaries of their given disciplines.

BLOAT WORLD is a discord community for people who work in the field of cultural production in any capacity and proximity to the ever-expanding edges of it, acting as a bridge between the magazine and real life. There are permanent community research channels on the themes of the magazine for everyone to participate in and reference, an area for voice shop talk, and structured weekly events such as work progress shares, courses on useful skills as well as much more on the horizon.

The BLOAT BELIEVER 1.1 token is an edition of 145 for all of the original purchasers of the first edition of BLOAT MAGAZINE. 
Holding this token gives you special access on BLOAT WORLD. Some benefits include: the ability to present work in the weekly work share, create new general text channels and access private BELIEVER-ONLY channels and events, as well as access to the library of take away information and presentations from previous courses.
